[1] Tournament Format

Junior debating tournaments are held in the Junior Asian Parliamentary format. Participating teams shall be composed of either three (3) or four (4) speakers and will be allocated to debate on the Proposition or Opposition side of the debate.

Each team will have three speakers delivering a 4-minute substantive speech and one reply speaker to summarise the debate in 3 minutes.

If a team only has three speakers. the Reply Speaker must be chosen from either the first or second speaker of the team.
